description: '''Marcia Llyneth Griffiths''' {{Post-nominals|country=JAM|list=[[Order of Jamaica|OJ]] [[Order of Distinction|OD]]}} (born 23 November 1949) is a [[Jamaicans|Jamaican]] singer best known for the 1989 remix of her single "[[Electric Boogie]]", which serves as the music for the four-wall "[[Electric Slide]]" line dance. It is the best-selling single of all time by a female [[reggae]] singer.
